1: מַשָּׂ֤א <sup>4853 </sup> <n>The burden</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>of the word</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> חַדְרָ֔ךְ <sup>2317 </sup> <n>of Hadrach</n> וְדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <sup>1834 </sup> <n>and Damascus</n> מְנֻחָת֑וֹ <sup>4496 </sup> <n>[shall be] the rest</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[shall be] toward the LORD</n> עֵ֣ין <sup>5869 </sup> <n>thereof when the eyes</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> וְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> שִׁבְטֵ֥י <sup>7626 </sup> <n>as of all the tribes</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
2: וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> חֲמָ֖ת <sup>2574 </sup> <n>And Hamath</n> תִּגְבָּל־ <sup>1379 </sup> <n>also shall border</n> בָּ֑הּ צֹ֣ר <sup>6865 </sup> <n>thereby Tyrus</n> וְצִיד֔וֹן <sup>6721 </sup> <n>and Zidon</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>though</n> חָֽכְמָ֖ה <sup>2449 </sup> <n>wise</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>though it be very</n>
3: וַתִּ֥בֶן <sup>1129 </sup> <n>did build</n> צֹ֛ר <sup>6865 </sup> <n>And Tyrus</n> מָצ֖וֹר <sup>4692 </sup> <n>herself a strong hold</n> לָ֑הּ וַתִּצְבָּר־ <sup>6651 </sup> <n>and heaped up</n> כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>silver</n> כֶּֽעָפָ֔ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>as the dust</n> וְחָר֖וּץ <sup>2742 </sup> <n>and fine gold</n> כְּטִ֥יט <sup>2916 </sup> <n>as the mire</n> חוּצֽוֹת׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>of the streets</n>
4: הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אֲדֹנָי֙ <sup>136 </sup> <n>Behold the Lord</n> יֽוֹרִשֶׁ֔נָּה <sup>3423 </sup> <n>will cast her out</n> וְהִכָּ֥ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and he will smite</n> בַיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>in the sea</n> חֵילָ֑הּ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>her power</n> וְהִ֖יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בָּאֵ֥שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n> תֵּאָכֵֽל׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and she shall be devoured</n>
5: תֵּרֶ֨א <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n> אַשְׁקְל֜וֹן <sup>831 </sup> <n>Ashkelon</n> וְתִירָ֗א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>[it] and fear</n> וְעַזָּה֙ <sup>5804 </sup> <n>Gaza</n> וְתָחִ֣יל <sup>2342 </sup> <n>sorrowful</n> מְאֹ֔ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>also [shall see it] and be very</n> וְעֶקְר֖וֹן <sup>6138 </sup> <n>and Ekron</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֹבִ֣ישׁ <sup>954 </sup> <n>has been</n> מֶבָּטָ֑הּ <sup>4007 </sup> <n>for her expectation</n> וְאָ֤בַד <sup>6 </sup> <n>shall perish</n> מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and the king</n> מֵֽעַזָּ֔ה <sup>5804 </sup> <n>from Gaza</n> וְאַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <sup>831 </sup> <n>and Ashkelon</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵשֵֽׁב׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>shall not be inhabited</n>
6: וְיָשַׁ֥ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>shall dwell</n> מַמְזֵ֖ר <sup>4464 </sup> <n>And a bastard</n> בְּאַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <sup>795 </sup> <n>in Ashdod</n> וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and I will cut off</n> גְּא֥וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>the pride</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n>
7: וַהֲסִרֹתִ֨י <sup>5493 </sup> <n>And I will take away</n> דָמָ֜יו <sup>1818 </sup> <n>his blood</n> מִפִּ֗יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>out of his mouth</n> וְשִׁקֻּצָיו֙ <sup>8251 </sup> <n>and his abominations</n> מִבֵּ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> שִׁנָּ֔יו <sup>8127 </sup> <n>from between his teeth</n> וְנִשְׁאַ֥ר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>but he that remaineth</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֵֽאלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>even he [shall be] for our God</n> וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and be like</n> כְּאַלֻּ֣ף <sup>441 </sup> <n>and he shall be as a governor</n> בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>in Judah</n> וְעֶקְר֖וֹן <sup>6138 </sup> <n>and Ekron</n> כִּיבוּסִֽי׃ <sup>2983 </sup> <n>as a Jebusite</n>
8: וְחָנִ֨יתִי <sup>2583 </sup> <n>And I will encamp</n> לְבֵיתִ֤י <sup>1004 </sup> <n>about mine house</n> מִצָּבָה֙ <sup>4675 </sup> <n>because of the army</n> מֵעֹבֵ֣ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>because of him that passeth by</n> וּמִשָּׁ֔ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and because of him that returneth</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and no</n> יַעֲבֹ֧ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>shall pass through</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>anymore</n> נֹגֵ֑שׂ <sup>5065 </sup> <n>and no oppressor</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> עַתָּ֖ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> רָאִ֥יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>them any more for now have I seen</n> בְעֵינָֽי׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>with mine eyes</n> ס
9: גִּילִ֨י <sup>1523 </sup> <n>Rejoice</n> מְאֹ֜ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>greatly</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>O daughter</n> צִיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> הָרִ֙יעִי֙ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>shout</n> בַּ֣ת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>O daughter</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> מַלְכֵּךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>behold thy King</n> יָ֣בוֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>cometh</n> לָ֔ךְ צַדִּ֥יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>unto thee he [is] just</n> וְנוֹשָׁ֖ע <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and having salvation</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עָנִי֙ <sup>6041 </sup> <n>lowly</n> וְרֹכֵ֣ב <sup>7392 </sup> <n>and riding</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> חֲמ֔וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>upon an ass</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> עַ֖יִר <sup>5895 </sup> <n>and upon a colt</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the foal</n> אֲתֹנֽוֹת׃ <sup>860 </sup> <n>of an ass</n>
10: וְהִכְרַתִּי־ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>And I will cut off</n> רֶ֣כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>the chariot</n> מֵאֶפְרַ֗יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>from Ephraim</n> וְסוּס֙ <sup>5483 </sup> <n>and the horse</n> מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>from Jerusalem</n> וְנִכְרְתָה֙ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>shall be cut off</n> קֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>bow</n> מִלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>and the battle</n> וְדִבֶּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and he shall speak</n> שָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> לַגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>unto the heathen</n> וּמָשְׁלוֹ֙ <sup>4915 </sup> <n>and his dominion</n> מִיָּ֣ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>[shall be] from sea</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> יָ֔ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>[even] to sea</n> וּמִנָּהָ֖ר <sup>5104 </sup> <n>and from the river</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אַפְסֵי־ <sup>657 </sup> <n>[even] to the ends</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
11: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אַ֣תְּ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בְּדַם־ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>As for thee also by the blood</n> בְּרִיתֵ֗ךְ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>of thy covenant</n> שִׁלַּ֤חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>I have sent forth</n> אֲסִירַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>615 </sup> <n>thy prisoners</n> מִבּ֔וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>out of the pit</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>wherein no</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>wherein [is] no water</n> בּֽוֹ׃
12: שׁ֚וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Turn</n> לְבִצָּר֔וֹן <sup>1225 </sup> <n>you to the strong hold</n> אֲסִירֵ֖י <sup>615 </sup> <n>ye prisoners</n> הַתִּקְוָ֑ה <sup>8615 </sup> <n>of hope</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>very</n> הַיּ֕וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>even to day</n> מַגִּ֥יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>do I declare</n> מִשְׁנֶ֖ה <sup>4932 </sup> <n>double</n> אָשִׁ֥יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[that] I will render</n> לָֽךְ׃
13: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> דָרַ֨כְתִּי <sup>1869 </sup> <n>When I have bent</n> לִ֜י יְהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> קֶ֚שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>the bow</n> מִלֵּ֣אתִי <sup>4390 </sup> <n>for me filled</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>with Ephraim</n> וְעוֹרַרְתִּ֤י <sup>5782 </sup> <n>and raised up</n> בָנַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thy sons</n> צִיּ֔וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>O Zion</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בָּנַ֖יִךְ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>against thy sons</n> יָוָ֑ן <sup>3120 </sup> <n>O Greece</n> וְשַׂמְתִּ֖יךְ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and made</n> כְּחֶ֥רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>thee as the sword</n> גִּבּֽוֹר׃ <sup>1368 </sup> <n>of a mighty man</n>
14: וַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> יֵֽרָאֶ֔ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall be seen</n> וְיָצָ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall go forth</n> כַבָּרָ֖ק <sup>1300 </sup> <n>as the lightning</n> חִצּ֑וֹ <sup>2671 </sup> <n>over them and his arrow</n> וַֽאדֹנָ֤י <sup>136 </sup> <n>and the Lord</n> יְהֹוִה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> בַּשּׁוֹפָ֣ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>the trumpet</n> יִתְקָ֔ע <sup>8628 </sup> <n>shall blow</n> וְהָלַ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and shall go</n> בְּסַעֲר֥וֹת <sup>5591 </sup> <n>with whirlwinds</n> תֵּימָֽן׃ <sup>8486 </sup> <n>of the south</n>
15: יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> צְבָאוֹת֮ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> יָגֵ֣ן <sup>1598 </sup> <n>shall defend</n> עֲלֵיהֶם֒ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and they</n> וְאָכְל֗וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>them and they shall devour</n> וְכָֽבְשׁוּ֙ <sup>3533 </sup> <n>and subdue</n> אַבְנֵי־ <sup>68 </sup> <n>stones</n> קֶ֔לַע <sup>7050 </sup> <n>with sling</n> וְשָׁת֥וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and they shall drink</n> הָמ֖וּ <sup>1993 </sup> <n>[and] make a noise</n> כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>with</n> יָ֑יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>as through wine</n> וּמָֽלְאוּ֙ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>and they shall be filled</n> כַּמִּזְרָ֔ק <sup>4219 </sup> <n>like bowls</n> כְּזָוִיּ֖וֹת <sup>2106 </sup> <n>[and] as the corners</n> מִזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>of the altar</n>
16: וְֽהוֹשִׁיעָ֞ם <sup>3467 </sup> <n>shall save</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> בַּיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>them in that day</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> כְּצֹ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>as the flock</n> עַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of his people</n> כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אַבְנֵי־ <sup>68 </sup> <n>for they [shall be as] the stones</n> נֵ֔זֶר <sup>5145 </sup> <n>of a crown</n> מִֽתְנוֹסְס֖וֹת <sup>5264 </sup> <n>lifted up as an ensign</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>127 </sup> <n>upon his land</n>
17: כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> טּוּב֖וֹ <sup>2898 </sup> <n>For how great [is] his goodness</n> וּמַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> יָפְי֑וֹ <sup>3308 </sup> <n>and how great [is] his beauty</n> דָּגָן֙ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>corn</n> בַּֽחוּרִ֔ים <sup>970 </sup> <n>shall make the young men</n> וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>and new wine</n> יְנוֹבֵ֥ב <sup>5107 </sup> <n>cheerful</n> בְּתֻלֽוֹת׃ <sup>1330 </sup> <n>the maids</n>
